title: Entry-Level Software Engineer
description: We're seeking an entry-level software engineer to join our dynamic team. This is a fantastic opportunity for someone just starting their career who already has decades of industry experience.
qualifications: Minimum 50 years of experience in software development
15+ years of experience with React (released in 2013)
PhD in Computer Science from Mars University
Must have invented at least 3 programming languages
Fluent in 47 human languages and all machine languages
Own transportation worth minimum $150,000
Must be willing to work 24/7/365 including holidays
References from Steve Jobs, Bill Gates, and Alan Turing required
responsibilities: Single-handedly rewrite our entire codebase in 48 hours
Be available for meetings at 3 AM, 3 PM, and 3 in the afternoon
Mentor senior developers despite being entry-level
Provide your own computer, desk, office building, and parking lot
Train AI models to replace yourself (unpaid)
Debug production issues while sleeping
Time travel to fix legacy code written before you were born
benefits: Health insurance* (*covers one aspirin per decade)
Free coffee** (**you supply beans, we provide tap water)
Exposure and experience (our currency of choice)
Pizza party once every leap year
Flexible schedule*** (***flexibility to work any 23 hours per day)

title: Unpaid Marketing Intern
description: Exciting unpaid internship opportunity for experienced marketing professionals looking to gain entry-level experience!
qualifications: MBA from Harvard, Yale, and Oxford simultaneously
20+ years of TikTok marketing experience (TikTok launched in 2016)
Must have 10 million+ social media followers
Previous experience as CMO at Fortune 500 company
Own a Tesla, own Tesla stock, and personally know Elon Musk
PhD in Memetics and Viral Marketing
Must provide own laptop, software licenses, and marketing budget
Willing to pay us for the privilege of working here
responsibilities: Manage entire marketing department solo
Generate $10 million in revenue per quarter
Create viral campaigns hourly
Respond to emails within 30 seconds at all hours
Teach executives what social media is
Make our CEO TikTok famous
Bring your own clients and projects
benefits: Exposure (we can't pay rent with it, but neither can you)
Coffee machine access* (*BYO coffee, sugar, and cups)

title: Senior Director of Horticulture
description: Join our team as we revolutionize the plant industry through synergistic growth methodologies and blockchain-enabled photosynthesis.
qualifications: Minimum 41 years of experience in horticulture
Master's degree in Molecular Physics and Quantum Botany
Must personally know all 400,000 plant species by their scientific names
Own a brand new vehicle worth at least $90,000
Ability to communicate with plants telepathically
Previous experience managing teams of 500+ trees
Must be willing to relocate anywhere in the universe on 2 hours notice
Own greenhouse, laboratory, and botanical garden
responsibilities: Make plants grow 500% faster using positive thinking
Develop AI-powered flowers
Work 168 hours per week (yes, all of them)
Provide own soil, water, sunlight, and gravity
Train plants to write code
Invent new colors for existing flowers
Reverse climate change single-handedly by Friday
benefits: Unlimited PTO* (*requires 18 months advance notice and board approval)
Annual team building*** (***mandatory unpaid weekend retreat)

title: Part-Time Graphic Designer
description: Seeking passionate designer for part-time role (80 hours per week). Must have undying love for design and total indifference to compensation.
qualifications: 30 years minimum experience with Figma (launched in 2016)
Must have designed logos for Apple, Nike, and NASA
BFA, MFA, and PhD in Design from RISD
Own professional studio worth $500,000+
Win 10+ international design awards annually
Possess working time machine to meet impossible deadlines
Must already be employed full-time elsewhere (we need your nights/weekends)
Bring your own clients who pay real money
responsibilities: Complete 50 projects per day
Work 80-100 hours per week (it's 'part-time' from our perspective)
Provide unlimited free revisions until CEO's spouse approves
Design for free, revise for free, breathe for free
Teach design classes to full-time staff
Make CEO's personal projects your top priority
Accept feedback like 'make it pop' and 'I'll know it when I see it'
benefits: Opportunity to work with 'industry leaders' (unpaid founders)

title: Chief Executive Officer
description: Revolutionary startup seeking CEO willing to work for equity in our vision. Salary is negotiable (downward only).
qualifications: Previously served as CEO of Amazon, Google, and Microsoft simultaneously
MBA from every Ivy League school
Net worth exceeding $1 billion (to invest in the company)
Personal relationships with all venture capitalists globally
Must own private jet for business travel (unpaid)
40+ years experience in cryptocurrency (Bitcoin launched 2009)
Ability to survive without sleep, food, or income
References from Warren Buffett, Jeff Bezos, and your future self
responsibilities: Make company profitable on Day 1 with $0 budget
Raise $100 million in funding using only charisma
Work 200 hours per week minimum
Pay yourself last (never)
Take full responsibility for all failures, credit founders for all successes
Provide personal funds to cover payroll during 'growth phases'
Make the company 'the next Tesla' by next Tuesday
benefits: Prestige of CEO title (only thing you'll be able to afford)
Opportunity to fail spectacularly in 18 months
Potential to be blamed for everything

title: Data Scientist / Barista / Janitor
description: We're looking for a passionate individual who can handle data science, make perfect espresso, and clean bathrooms with equal expertise.
qualifications: PhD in Statistics, Machine Learning, and Janitorial Sciences
25+ years experience with Python, R, SQL, espresso machines, and mops
Barista certification from Italy
Olympic-level multitasking abilities
Must own industrial cleaning equipment and AI computing cluster
Previous experience running three full-time jobs simultaneously
Ability to build ML models while steaming milk and scrubbing toilets
Must provide own coffee beans, cleaning supplies, and neural networks
responsibilities: Build production ML models between coffee orders
Clean entire office before 6 AM daily
Serve as company barista during all business hours
Manage data pipelines while managing bathroom pipes
Train neural networks and new baristas
Deep clean while doing deep learning
Be available 24/7 for data emergencies and coffee emergencies
benefits: One role, three jobs, one salary!
Never a dull moment (or a free moment)

title: Social Media Manager
description: Fast-paced agency seeks social media expert who lives and breathes content. Literally. No time for non-content activities.
qualifications: 10 million+ personal followers across all platforms
15 years experience with Instagram Reels (launched 2020)
Must be under 22 years old with 30 years experience
Own professional photo studio, video equipment worth $200,000+
Previous experience going viral hourly
Doctorate in Memeology from a top university
Personal friendships with every influencer globally
Never sleep (content doesn't create itself at 3 AM)
responsibilities: Post 500 pieces of viral content daily
Respond to all comments within 0.3 seconds
Grow following by 1 million per week
Work 24/7 monitoring trends
Create TikToks, Reels, Stories, Posts simultaneously while sleeping
Make CEO's personal accounts famous
Predict trends 6 months in advance
Use personal equipment and accounts for all company content
benefits: Develop severe social media addiction (on the clock)

title: Full-Stack Everything Developer
description: We need a developer who can code, design, manage, market, sell, and support. Also legal, accounting, and lunch runs.
qualifications: Expert in every programming language (including ones not yet invented)
35 years experience in frontend, backend, mobile, ML, DevOps, and blockchain
Law degree for handling contracts
CPA license for company accounting
Marketing degree for growth hacking
Commercial driver's license for deliveries
Medical degree (in case anyone gets hurt)
Must own data center and law firm
responsibilities: Build entire product solo
Handle all tech, design, legal, accounting, HR, and janitorial duties
Work 200+ hours per week
Be expert in everything
Make CEO's technical ignorance your problem
Support production 24/7 while shipping new features hourly
Do everyone's job for one person's salary
benefits: Experience doing 10 jobs poorly instead of 1 job well

title: Junior Account Executive
description: Join our aggressive sales team! We're a family! (A family that expects you to bring your own family members as clients.)
qualifications: 25+ years of B2B enterprise sales experience
Existing client portfolio generating $50 million annually
Must bring book of business worth $100M+ on Day 1
Personal network including every Fortune 500 CEO
Own luxury car for client transportation
Previous experience as VP of Sales at multiple companies
Ability to sell ice to penguins, sand to beaches
Must have wealthy family members as guaranteed customers
responsibilities: Generate $10 million in revenue monthly
Bring existing clients from previous employer (legally questionable)
Work 100% commission with negative base salary
Pay for all client entertainment from own pocket
Cold call 1,000 prospects daily
Close deals that don't exist
Achieve 200% of impossible quota
benefits: Opportunity to experience poverty while being employed
Transportation stipend** (**must provide own vehicle, gas, and tolls)
Presidents Club trip*** (***if you pay your own way)

title: Content Writer / Video Editor / Developer
description: We believe in efficiency! Why hire three people when we can pay one person one-third of one salary to do three jobs?
qualifications: Pulitzer Prize for writing
Oscar for film editing
Turing Award for programming
20+ years experience in each field
Own professional video studio and software development lab
Must be under 25 years old to be 'entry-level'
Ability to write, edit, and code simultaneously
Time manipulation powers
responsibilities: Write 50 articles daily
Edit 100 videos weekly
Build and maintain entire website
Do all three simultaneously
Work 25 hours per day
Never take breaks (productivity!)
Be three people for the price of 0.3 people
benefits: Master the art of doing everything poorly
Imposter syndrome in three fields at once
